item.description:
Many of you have not attended anything for a while.

Please drop by North Haven Starbucks for a hot drink and conversation.

Link for a Starbucks Meet Up in North Haven on Washington Avenue.

http://www.starbucks....

www.starbucks.com/Retail/Find/storedetails.aspx?sid=62421&coords=06516|41.291787120809|-72.93827
162743248|10&undefined=1

This Starbucks is right off I 91 Exit 12..
It is right next to CVS Pharmacy.

It is in a small shopping area, the stores from left to right;
Liberty Bank, AT & T, Quiznos Sub, Vague Nail Spa 2 and
Then Starbucks.

There are many more stores and restaurants on Rte 5
In North Haven in case you want to go some where
Else after the Meet Up.

This event depends on the weather.
If there is any very bad weather, then this
Meet Up will be cancelled and rescheduled.

Mike B
Organizer for Coffee Talk
item.how_to_find_us: I will have a purple back pack.
item.name: Starbucks Coffee on Rt 5 in North Haven
